website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and with a small profile, this mouse is reasonably priced and travels well.
pros: Small and portable, with a nice, fun design
Wireless link works up to 33 feet
cons: Despite its claim, this does not come with a Unifying USB receiver
Some felt that this option did not seem very sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I gave my wife one of these (fox image) over a year ago at a store, but it was misplaced/lost. It was so good to be able to find a replacement! (I could no longer find one in stores)
customer_reviews.author: Ren J. Tescher

customer_reviews.title: my favorite mouse
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these (different designs). By far my favorite mice. The click is not loud and annoying, the roll wheel rolls smoothly. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Working Great!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this mouse! So far it is working great. No issues at all! I can't testify to the gaming issue as she only plays things such as Roblox and does her online school work. Haven't had to change the battery yet so I don't know battery life for this mouse. But so far it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Judy M

customer_reviews.title: SO STINKING CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I am all about cute office stuff and this is exactly that. Probably not something a professional 30 something would have on their desk, but I freakin love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Brett

customer_reviews.title: Felicity Fox 🦊 rocks
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable mouse and works really well. No problems so far. I have found Logitech to be a really reliable company when it comes to mice. And foxes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Clements

customer_reviews.title: .Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this wireless mouse. I’ve been using it now for a little over the month and it’s perfect size and has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Opp

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless mouse
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse so much that I've bought two of them-- one for my personal laptop and one for work. It works super well, looks adorable, and never gets mixed up with anyone else's!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: and it functions great. It's also managed to stay pretty clean despite ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mouse for a while now and I have no complains. The design is cute, and it functions great. It's also managed to stay pretty clean despite what it's been through with arts and crafts done on the same desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and adorable. The battery life is very long and no installation is required.
customer_reviews.author: Jenine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and it's a Logitech, only ones I use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love this mouse!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Logitech mouse! Adds character to my otherwise boring work desk. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barron

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not as sturdy as 305 design
customer_reviews.text: Cute graphic. Thought it would be fun to have. Seems slightly larger than 305 and not as sturdy. However, size works fine for smaller hands and space in travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: Great small mouse
customer_reviews.text: It is a smaller sized mouse but my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whoops! Very durable! :)
customer_reviews.text: I have dropped this mouse at least 2 dozen times and it still works great! So cute. I get so many compliments at work. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Olson

customer_reviews.title: they are great. The batteries last forever
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these for the office, they are great. The batteries last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Herder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a matching mouse pad! Love it! Great mouse! Fits comfortably in your hand and is super cute! I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cindyrellie

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: A good mouse at a very reasonable price. The Fox always cheer me up by just looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid little mouse!
customer_reviews.text: Solid mouse, use it for my android box, works great.
customer_reviews.author: M. ONeal

customer_reviews.title: False description
customer_reviews.text: The description says it comes with a unifying USB but it did not. The mouse works fine though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse.
customer_reviews.text: I use this mouse at work and it is very comfortable for all day use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Heath

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and identifiable
customer_reviews.text: Cute and quirky by design. Easily identifiable. Lightweight and easy to use. Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luvmypuppers

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and nice design
customer_reviews.text: I received my mouse very quick and am more than just satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mouse is very cute and works like it should
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is very cute and works like it should. Definitely like having it as a replacement to one that quit scrolling. The only thing I noticed is that it has a more plastic feel that my previous mouses/mice.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good size mouse for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to update library computers using wired mice to wireless. Cleans up clutter and kids enjoy the different patterns. Size is good too for smaller sized hands in elementary school grades.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: Art meets function
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, design and handling of the mouse. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: This "M317" mouse is actually an "M317c"! That little c means something!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I really like Logitech wireless mice, especially the M317. However, **this posting is not labeled correctly**! This model is an "M317c", not a 317 (without the "c"). The c units do not have a Unifying Receiver with the orange star. If you have an orange star mouse in every room -- many of us do -- then you know what this means. The logitech mice with nice graphics are usually c versions that only work with the receiver in the box. C'mon Logitech, label this ad correctly!!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Mick

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Convenient, Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my petite hand. The mouse does have a distinctive click, but it’s never bothered anyone at my office. Four stars because it lasted less than two years —I would recommend getting the extra warranty. My mouse light just started going dead recently and no longer works but Felicity Fox still looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Powers

customer_reviews.title: Love my wireless mouse and the fox on it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my wireless mouse and the fox on it makes it a lot of fun to look at each time I use my mouse. Great Price also!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Dixon

product_meta.title: Logitech Wireless Mouse m317 with Unifying Receiver Felicity Fox
